{{TeyvatQuest|0|1|part=2}}

==Steps==
#Talk to [[Paimon]]
#Defeat the [[Slimes]]
#* {{Enemy|Pyro Slime|x=1}} will appear.
#Press/Tap to unleash [[Elemental Skill]]
#Defeat the [[Slimes]]
#* {{Enemy|Pyro Slime|x=2}} will appear.
#Hold Elemental Skill
#Defeat the [[Slimes]]
#* {{Enemy|Pyro Slime|x=2}} will appear.
#Use [[Elemental Burst]]
#Defeat the [[Slimes]]
#* {{Enemy|Pyro Slime|x=4}} will appear.

==Notes==
* Completing this quest will grant the ''[[Wonders of the World]]'' achievement "[[Let the Wind Lead (Wonders of the World)|Let the Wind Lead]]."
*The player will unlock the Party Setup, Friends, Characters, Community, Feedback, Notices, Mail, and Time menus within the pause menu after completing this quest.

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|As you advanced, a [[Statue of the Seven]] appeared on the horizon ahead of you. At Paimon's suggestion, you go to investigate.}}
{{dialogue start}}
;(After defeating the slimes)
:{{A|vo mdaq008 4 paimon 01.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' These are the Anemo powers you got from the Statue of the Seven.
:{{A|vo mdaq008 4 paimon 02.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Aww... Paimon's so jealous! Why doesn't Paimon get cool fighting powers!?
{{dialogue end}}
